subject: Boxing
Cable Television
Television
lead_paragraph: Oscar De La Hoya’s bouts have brought in a record $626 million in pay-per-view revenue. On Saturday, he will fight on HBO for the first time in seven years.
snippet: Oscar De La Hoya’s bouts have brought in a record $626 million in pay-per-view revenue. On Saturday, he will fight on HBO for the first time in seven years.
